pr_title: Add all doc books to release archives

timeline.message:
Add all our documentation books to our release archives

Signed-off-by: Jakub Scholz <www@scholzj.com>

Do not include the docs contributing guide

Signed-off-by: Jakub Scholz <www@scholzj.com>

Name the using guide using.html instead of index.html

Signed-off-by: Jakub Scholz <www@scholzj.com>

timeline.bodyText: why index.html is copied as using.html?
timeline.author: ppatierno
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -130,7 +130,9 @@ pushtonexus:
 
 release_docu: docu_html docu_htmlnoheader
 	mkdir -p strimzi-$(RELEASE_VERSION)/docs
-	$(CP) -rv documentation/html/index.html strimzi-$(RELEASE_VERSION)/docs/
+	$(CP) -rv documentation/html/index.html strimzi-$(RELEASE_VERSION)/docs/using.html

replies.bodyText: Because it seemed to be a bit confusing to me to have the one book there as index.html. It might confuse users to think that it includes the other books etc.
replies.author: scholzj

replies.bodyText: After some more discussion I renamed the file back to index.html and will open a new issue to rename it everywhere.
replies.author: scholzj

timeline.message:
Use the old index.html filename for the using guide
